titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry - American Ace - 1948-01-17 - Excerpts 2

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: Excerpts from an American Ace sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment (7:30-8:00 pm) from January 17, 1948. Featuring Roy Acuff, fiddler Tommy (likely Jackson or Magness), Pap, and special guests Governor Melvin Thompson of Georgia, Governor William Tuck of Virginia, and Governor Jim McCord of Tennessee. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
